logicName: 我的待办事项清单计数器
name: 我的待办事项清单计数器

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 今日面试人数
待筛选简历
getPSDELogicNodes.sql: select count(1)as filter_apply from hr_applicant t inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on t.STAGE_ID  = t2.id where  t2.`SEQUENCE` = '20' and t.status = '1'

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 待发送offer
getPSDELogicNodes.sql: select count(1)as to_send_offer from hr_applicant t inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on t.STAGE_ID  = t2.id where  t2.`SEQUENCE` = '70' and t.status = '1'

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 待入职
getPSDELogicNodes.sql: select count(1)as to_onboard from hr_applicant t inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on t.STAGE_ID  = t2.id where  t2.`SEQUENCE` = '80' and t.status = '1'

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 初试-待面试
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as first_interview_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '40'
	and t.status = '1'
	and exists(
		select * from hr_interview t3 inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id
			where  t3.STAGE_ID = '1' and t3.STATUS  = '1' and t4.APPLICANT_ID  = t.ID 
	)

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 初试-待反馈
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as first_feedback_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '40'
	and t.status = '1'
	and 
	exists(
		select * from hr_interview t3 
		inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id 
		inner join hr_interview_feedback t5  on t3.id = t5.INTERVIEW_ID 
		where 
		t3.STAGE_ID = '1' and t3.STATUS  = '2'
		and t.id = t5.APPLICANT_ID  and t5.RESULT_TYPE  is null
	)

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 初试-待处理
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as first_process_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '40'
	and t.status = '1'
	and exists(
	    select * from(
			    select 
			       t5.APPLICANT_ID,
		           count(1) as cnt 
		           from hr_interview t3 
				inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id 
				inner join hr_interview_feedback t5 on t3.id = t5.INTERVIEW_ID 
				where 
				t3.STAGE_ID = '1' and t3.STATUS = '2'
				and t5.RESULT_TYPE is null
		    	group by t5.APPLICANT_ID 
	    	) as sub 
	        where sub.APPLICANT_ID = t.id  
	          and sub.cnt = 0  
    )

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 复试-待处理
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as second_process_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '60'
	and t.status = '1'
	and exists(
	    select * from(
			    select 
			       t5.APPLICANT_ID,
		           count(1) as cnt 
		           from hr_interview t3 
				inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id 
				inner join hr_interview_feedback t5 on t3.id = t5.INTERVIEW_ID 
				where 
				t3.STAGE_ID = '2' and t3.STATUS = '2'
				and t5.RESULT_TYPE is null
		    	group by t5.APPLICANT_ID 
	    	) as sub 
	        where sub.APPLICANT_ID = t.id  
	          and sub.cnt = 0  
    )

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 复试-待反馈
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as second_feedback_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '60'
	and t.status = '1'
	and 
	exists(
		select * from hr_interview t3 
		inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id 
		inner join hr_interview_feedback t5  on t3.id = t5.INTERVIEW_ID 
		where 
		t3.STAGE_ID = '2' and t3.STATUS  = '2'
		and t.id = t5.APPLICANT_ID  and t5.RESULT_TYPE  is null
	)

getPSDELogicNodes.name: 复试-待面试
getPSDELogicNodes.sql:
select
	count(1) as second_interview_pending
from
	hr_applicant t
inner join hr_recruitment_stage t2 on
	t.STAGE_ID = t2.id
where
	t2.`SEQUENCE` = '60'
	and t.status = '1'
	and exists(
		select * from hr_interview t3 inner join hr_applicant_interview t4 on t3.id = t4.interview_id
			where  t3.STAGE_ID = '2' and t3.STATUS  = '1' and t4.APPLICANT_ID  = t.ID 
	)
